clinical_study.brief_title: Health, Integration, Concentration: Mindfulness in Schools
clinical_study.official_title: Gesundheit, Integration, Konzentration: Achtsamkeitsbasierte Stabilisierung Von LehrerInnen Und SchülerInnen

collaborator.agency: Ministerium für Schule und Weiterbildung, Land Nordrhein-Westfalen
Ministerium für Gesundheit, Emanzipation, Pflege und Alter, Land Nordrhein-Westfalen

brief_summary.textblock: Mindfulness training for teacher and children of primary schools. Blinded and controlled study design. Burnout as primary outcome for teacher and classroom behavior for children.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Note: Either teacher and pupils are included in this study. We anticipate a number of 100 teacher and 500 pupils participating. Data from teacher and pupils will be analyzed separately.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline; Timepoint 1 (4 month); Timepoint 2 (12 month); Timepoint 3 (16 month)
Baseline; Timepoint 1 (4 month); Timepoint 2 (12 month); Timepoint 3 (16 month)
primary_outcome.description: Emotional and social school experience questionnaire (Change from baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Stress and Anxiety (Teacher) assessed with the Stress and Anxiety Inventory
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline; Timepoint 1 (4 month); Timepoint 2 (12 month); Timepoint 3 (16 month)
secondary_outcome.description: Stress and Anxiety Inventory for teacher (Change from baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mindfulness (Teacher) assessed with the Freiburg Mindfulness Inventory
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline; Timepoint 1 (4 month); Timepoint 2 (12 month); Timepoint 3 (16 month)

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration (pupils) assessed with a d2-Concentration assessment tool
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline; Timepoint 1 (4 month); Timepoint 2 (12 month); Timepoint 3 (16 month)

secondary_outcome.measure: Health-related Quality of Life (pupils) assessed with the Kidscreen-10
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline; Timepoint 1 (4 month); Timepoint 2 (12 month); Timepoint 3 (16 month)

arm_group.description: One school semester MBSR training for teacher; followed by one school semester mindfulness training for children and one school semester follow-up period.
One school semester waitlist; followed by one school semester MBSR training for teacher and one school semester MBSR training for children.
